title: Strengthening Practical AI Competencies: Universal Design for Learning (UDL) and Differentiated Instruction for Inclusive English Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design lesson plans based on the three principles of UDL (Universal Design for Learning): engagement, representation, and action & expression.
Learners can demonstrate English lessons for mixed-ability learners, including those with visual impairments, using VR simulations.
Learners can develop customized assessment tools for different learner levels by applying Differentiated Instruction (DI) strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
